definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: On the journey home, the joy of the farm labourers was beyond description.
sentences.chinese: 还家旅途上，农民工的喜悦心情无法形容。

sentences.english: For the Russian people, it brought unspeakable suffering.
sentences.chinese: 对俄罗斯人民来说，这场入侵带来了无法形容的苦难。

sentences.english: Conscience is considered legal James, an indescribable pain.
sentences.chinese: 良心认为合法的景慕，有着无法形容的痛苦。

sentences.english: The horse the teacher answer so fast, can't describe.
sentences.chinese: 只见马老师答得那么快，简直无法形容。

sentences.english: But the feeling aroused by the scenery cannot be described even by the poet.
sentences.chinese: 连诗人都无法形容的却是那山水间勾人心魂的气息。

sentences.english: After that the blackness of unutterable night.
sentences.chinese: 在那以后，就是无法形容的漫长黑夜了。

sentences.english: You can't describe the pain. It was so painful.
sentences.chinese: 就像爆炸一样，无法形容那种疼痛，实在是太疼了。

sentences.english: Phantasmagoria portray the unspeakable , they rise above the written language.
sentences.chinese: 幻影描绘无法形容的事物，它超越了语言文字。

sentences.english: Your performance is so substandard that we don’t have an adjective to describe it.
sentences.chinese: 你的表现太糟了，简直无法形容。

sentences.english: It is impossible to put into words the feeling of my first sighting of an iceberg on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 无法形容第一次在海平线上看到冰山的感受。

sentences.english: And what was there Raine couldn't even put a name to it.
sentences.chinese: 而那里是雷恩无法形容，甚至说不出它的名称来。

sentences.english: Oh in so many ways I just can't describe.
sentences.chinese: 哦无论用什么方式我都无法形容。

sentences.english: I can't describe the color—charcoal, brown.
sentences.chinese: 我无法形容那颜色，像木炭，深褐色。

sentences.english: The scenery on the top is beyond description.
sentences.chinese: 在顶部的风景是无法形容。

sentences.english: The mood was light and defined by an indescribably strong air of unity.
sentences.chinese: 氛围是轻松的，空气中充满着无法形容的团结气氛。

sentences.english: The scenery of Jiuzhaigou is beautiful beyond description.
sentences.chinese: 九寨沟的风景美得无法形容。

definition: in the extreme (idiom)/incapable of further increase
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
